thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 7 of 504
thread.title: Frances

author: Frances
title: Frances
text: My friend has a pair of Fabletics leggings and raved about them! I had the chance to try them on and immediately fell in love! They are so comfortable and, better yet, secure! I don't constantly have to pull them up and they do a really nice job with holding my tummy/legs steady while I run! 10/10 would definitely recommend! I am 5'10 and wear a L - XL in most clothing, so finding leggings that fit and are attractive is rare. These are perfect and make me feel much more confident in the gym!
